document.full_text: yemen's president was to sign an agreement on saturday to quit power in a month's time in exchange for immunity, a deal rejected by street protesters demanding his immediate ouster and prosecution.
document.title: yemen's saleh due to sign transition deal
lines_and_colors: yemen's president was to sign an agreement on saturday to quit power in a month's time in exchange for immunity, a deal rejected by street protesters demanding his immediate ouster and prosecution.
